timeline.bodyText: I suggest just using a BufferedReader with the META-INF/MANIFEST.MF JarEntry input stream to log it line by line.  I worry that the JarFile Manifest object may give us an empty  attributes even when the manifest resource has some corrupted data in it.
timeline.author: tjwatson

replies.bodyText: Thanks Tom!  Updates made based on your suggestion.
replies.author: hlhoots
